    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BoardColorSettingsDialog
    Dialog window allowing users to customize board colors and piece style.
    ChessApp
    Main entry point for the Chess GUI application.
    ChessBoardPanel
    Main chessboard panel with: - Drag and drop - Click-to-move - Color theme + piece style + resizing - Supports three piece styles: default, vibrant, ocean
    ChessFrame
    Main application frame: contains board, history, timer, and menu bar.
    GameState
    Holds the pieces on the board, current player, and move stack for undo.
    HistoryPanel
    A panel that displays move history, captured pieces, and provides an Undo feature.
    MenuBar
    Menu bar with New, Save, Load, Settings and Exit.
    Move
    Represents a move for history and undo support.
    Piece
    Represents a chess piece (color invalid input: '&' type).
    PieceColor
    Color of a piece.
    PieceType
    Type of chess piece.
    SettingsManager
    Manages user preferences for board colors, styles, and sizes.
    SettingsWindow
    A settings dialog allowing the user to change board color themes, piece styles, and square size.
    ThemeSettings
    Placeholder class for future theme settings.
    TimerPanel
    A Swing panel that displays and manages timers for both White and Black players.
